title: 客户端加载后闪退
author: 1301066895l
txt_content: 服务器的客户端本人能进，朋友加载到最后出现loading finising up然后就关了

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-8-20 12:43 编辑 
1301066895l 发表于 2019-8-20 12:27
https://pan.baidu.com/s/1CvonLI0oa8PkffAwiRg5AA[10:28:18] [Client thread/INFO]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:-1]: java.lang.RuntimeException: Error Compiling shader: Fragment shader failed to compile with the following errors:
ERROR: 0:3: error(#263) "Precision qualifier" is not supported prior to GLSL version 1.30
ERROR: 0:4: error(#263) "Precision qualifier" is not supported prior to GLSL version 1.30
ERROR: error(#273) 2 compilation errors.  No code generated UCHIE        alfheim{BETA-18} [Alfheim] ([艾尔夫海姆-18]Alfheim-BETA-18.jar) Caught exception from alfheim
java.lang.RuntimeException: Error Linking program: Error: No shaders attached to current program 

        at alexsocol.asjlib.render.ASJShaderHelper.createProgram(ASJShaderHelper.java:76) ~[ASJShaderHelper.class:?]FML: MCP v9.05 FML v7.10.99.99 Minecraft Forge 10.13.4.1558 Optifine OptiFine_1.7.10_HD_U_C1 52 mods loaded, 52 mods active
尝试更新高清修复optifine，从崩溃报告来看是GLSL（光影渲染）版本太低导致 艾尔夫海姆mod不受支持。如果仍然崩溃的话就先移除高清修复然后把新生成的崩溃报告也发一下。

链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Am_-U6lec-575rKodP__BA 
提取码：a  4  u  u

另可尝试更新forge版本到1614
